alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:08PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN PIKE AND NORTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 608 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Kincaid Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Piketon, Lucasville, Kincaid Springs, Rarden, Givens, Wakefield, Ladd, Mount Joy, Bear Creek, Elm Grove and Idaho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
